root.name: Yarudora Series Vol. 1: Double Cast
root.description: OverviewYarudora Series Vol.1: Double Cast is the first entry in the Yarudora series of FMV adventure games with animation by Production I.G. and character designs by Keiji Gotoh. The game was developed by Sugar Rockets and was published by SCEI in 1998 for the PlayStation. Double Cast was later ported to the PlayStation Portable by SCEI in 2005 as Yarudora Portable: Double Cast.
